remarks: Condition implying "is a line".  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2012.)
statement:
isline.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
isline.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isline.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
isline.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
islinei $p |- ( ( ( K e. D /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( Q =/= R /\ X = { p e. A | p .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) } ) ) -> X e. N ) $.
$d A p $.
$d K p $.
$d Q p $.
$d R p $.
